Blog.post: hm, back to sch yea? lol! starting next week i will be having both sss and sdsp. meaning i'll only be back home at about 5. another gd piece of news is holland made it through by winning on penalties against sweden. having my lunch soon, later yea.

im quite steady fishing but nv before on a boat. yesterday was quite an experience. hardly gt any fish because of strong wind at the southern part of singapore. we started at 6. 4 hrs later, still no sign of fish. i was getting abit frustrated as fishing on a boat is totally different than fishing by the beach or at the jetty. the movement of the boat because of the waves at times make me want to puke. around 11, i slept. my dad and his friends continued fishing. by the time i woke up next morning, they had started packing. i checked the cooler, and shocked to see two baby sharks and a number of small fishes. nt bad heh? ok la, later yea.

crap. played football bare foot cost me great deal of pain. i suffered deep cut at the base of my feet and ruptured my heel. i can still walk but the pain, unbearable. gt to limp to minimize the pain. going out fishing, later yea.
call 1627. follow instructions. call #100#. follow instructions.
hey, just gt back frm playing soccer. em today went normal, nothing exciting except for the holland result of course :) hm, heading for tuition soon, later yea.
yay! holland make it through to last eight! phywit! nothing much so far, later yea.

rise and shine. woke up early today as my mom woke up late so help her deliver newspaper to blks 365, 363 and 362. i was actually still sleepy but the eerie atmosphere kept me awake. felt pity for my mom, earning a month about $130 by waking up at 4.30 and deliver those heavy load newspapers. anyways, just taking a break frm revision. hm, looking fwd to 'chess warriors' 12.30 later. thts all, later yea.
wee!! mp3 player fixed! finally after waiting for 5 long weeks. just came back frm 305 with nasir. math tys qn 11(b), try doing it. i doubt mdm lee can. lol!

ok. my parents went out this morning. finished my tuition work. still have nt had my breakfast (at 11+). imran, liyana, hasrul and quincy came and asked me for badminton rackets. btw, i like this chinese show 'chess warriors' at 12.30 to 1.30 (every tues to fri i think). can say i spent the whole morning and afternoon playing cm4. now at season 2. so far, i bought cavallero(gk), van buyten(def) and kallstrom(mid). btw, im managing arsenal so need nt get any strikers! :P hm, holland will go against latvia today. must win!! thts all. later yea.
just started using this site. wats the purpose? journal ah? hm, start off pretty well just gt confused with the program picasa and hello. later yea.

ms chua gave us three days to come up with a game based on poa. my group consists of four ppl, including myself. now, i cannot get hold two of the members. that leaves me with sarath left. pissed me off when he said tht he will nt show up if javis nv come. fuck right! abey tinggal kn aku sorang ah nk buat assignment ni?! useless to show my anger now. its important i get it done with or without the help of my grp. but i cant think of any kind of game which needs poa as its foundation. monopoly will quite a burden, i cant possibly do it on my own. dont know ah ..

nothing to do. everything went smooth in sch. poa mock test was nt tht tough. during sdsp, it rained so we thought the match against teachers were cancelled. gt shocked to see the pupils frm 4E1 had already started the match despite wet weather. i hurried back home bcos i left all the stuffs behind. but when i gt back, the match was called off. wat i heard was mr yeo told the sch was closing. wasted ah .. ! anyway, played soccer with my friends in the evening. yikes, skipped my religious class. back at home, spent about 1 hr plus on the phone with aidah. thts about all today. be back soon ..

ey. all went wrong in sch today. i reached sch late. march la round the concourse for 30 mins .. approximately. not enough, mohd told me to wear the slippers. disgraced i am. anyway, liyana showed me her baby photos during eng class just now. cute sey. nt long after, donald's phone gt confiscated. dumb bloke using phone in class. this has been two consecutive time i had nt brought my tie along. wah seh, azizah came to my rescue. assembly was ok la, quite dull. sss and sdsp went well. three months left, pilot farid .. !! after sch, sent aidah home. she showed me th puppet. look easy to make but she said otherwise. wah, need to spare 15 dollars to get some bks. met nasser and faizal ard 10. faizal and me cannot tahan the way nasser irk his sis. today we covered 4 km approximately. fuh, tmr match against teachers! cool :P hope 4E will win .. insyaAllah. :)

em. dont feel so good today. sch was alright, sdsp was great. the only thing was i felt my brain compressing, quite pain. in class, the normal jokers; imran, sarath javis straight shoot at mr long by saying 'was!'. our class has started this 'was!' phenomena. the term 'was!' is shortened for 'was that meant to be a joke?!' wahaha. as normal, mr long would give lame jokes. having nothing to do, sarath voiced out first. mr long was saying something about eminem lyrics 'will the real slim shady pls stand up' bcos all of us were still sitting down when he stepped in front of the class (pg lesson). then sarath went 'WAS!'. the whole class cracked. mr long didnt understand wat it meant and so, heck care. the class was already sitted after grooming themselves with the tie except me. mr long said to the whole class 'farid, how long you want to take to finish tying ur tie? two periods of pg?' he said with a grin. i laughed and said 'was!' the whole class laughed again. then sri approached me and said jokingly in malay 'eh farid, pompuan pun kalah la. lama nah kau siap?!' hm. nt looking fwd to much tmr also dah. hm, poa mock test, math test and chem test. lol, looking fwd to = i, robot = release date 29/7. em, had a chat with aidah. weird was wat her 1st impression of me. then she said when she gt to know me, she said ok ah. hm, the funny part was she wont sit still and laugh when i wanted to take her photo. hehe, tht was 'the moment of the week' so far. thts all, later yea.

hm. she noes everything, well .. almost everything to say the least. nvm tht. everything went well during oral this afternoon only for the conversation part that messed it all up. the question asked: have u watched any festive celebration put up by any racial group? the first killer qn that had me went blank. normally im quite an easy smooth speaker even with strangers. i answered: em. er. ar. ive watched a chinese festive celebration performed by CHINESE - like durh! em. er. they set up a nice formation and finish off with one dancer executing an acrobatic move. then, i asked them to ask a diff qn. the teachers gave a laugh and asked me to elaborate the first qn. i broke down but nv shed a tear. my confidence sank. i kept silent thru for the following qns asked. a dismay day, yet again. woa, still gt poa test tmr. how long will this prolong?! at least something nice happened. like the old saying goes; theres nv a day dat passed by with just bad news. well yea, at least theres something to look fwd to tmr. hope everything goes to plan. like the saying goes; kite hanya merancang, allah menentukan segalanya. in other words; we can only plan, god will decide everything. hm. im getting worked out. later yea.

em, took my mt listening compre this morning. kirsten dunst is sweet! yea! lol. my dad just booked a boat for the whole family for a fishing trip. to say no to him would be hard as we have nt went out as a family for quite a while. i was like 50:50 whether to go or nt as i'll be having poa and math test next week respectively. i finally gt my motivation to strive for o'level because of someone. her family status is good, so i imagined me marrying her. to think of my level of qualification now would be impossible to support her. so this 'dream' had make a great impact on me yesterday. i spent solid 4 hrs covering my physics as in writing in point form for the first four chp. to see whether i'll make it this o'level, just wait and see. later yea.

fun day i had. sch was nt bad. yesterday was fun too. faizal, imran and me went hyper siao and started doing things i nv thought of doing. we did some stunts that from my point of view, rather risky. anyway, back to today. after fri prayers, went back home and gt dressed up b4 watching spiderman 2. wow! spiderman's identity have been revealed. very unexpected. but i was quite happy at the same time as mj gt to know who peter really was and yea, the romantic part very shiok. for sure there will be spiderman 3. likley villain this time will be harry. likely reasons will be avenging his father's death and getting back mj from peter. looking fwd! :P well, aidah accompanied me other than faizal, imran and gek teng. i have this crush on her but im thinking nt to rush into anything with o level fast approaching. dont know her much but so far so gd. our relationship is building quite steadily. thts all, later yea.

eNg oraL weNt smoOth! stAyed baCk aftEr oRal. plaYed cheSs agAinst iskaNdar And yEa .. i wOn. mom wAs nt at hOme but she leFt a noTe asKin mE to dO tHe houSe choRes. yikEs! still hAd nt bouGht tHe Eng bK .. *anYwAy, off tO dinNer .. bb!

did work during the day. about five went out. jenice wanted to give a slice of her pizza but it ended up getting burnt bcos she set the microwave to max. how dumb can a person get :P anyway, just gt back home. arsenal vs everton match coming up very soon! special day .. OnE mOntH! :) eng oral tmr .. gives me the chill. hope to do well .. bb!

i was hoping for a b3 for mt. instead, gt c5. disappointing really. since sec1, nv had i gt b4 and below for mt. shed tears of failure when i informed my dad about the result. have made up my mind to retake the paper. a painful decision bcos can use the mt period to do math. hm .. shit happens. im still holding on hope to be a pilot. :(

nt the best of days i had in sch. did the aces twice during pe. forget to bring chem work but thankfully im one of ms tays fav so .. nv kena punish. ask imran to accompany me to find something. went to northpoint, centre point and junction 8 .. but didnt find wat i hoped for. going to finish up some work .. bb

covered chem during the day. found out 4E had start preparations for teachers day concert. imran persuade me to take part but nah. time nt on my side. em, tuition coming up at 7. meeting nasser at night. hm, a dull day it has been.

just gt baCk home. badMinton was fuN with nasser juSt now. the jets were grEat! hahah .. funny sey b4 i gt hoMe just now. naSser was with me at tHe fitness stAtion. then there was this residEnt having karaoKe at 11plus, so i called thE police. doNt noe wAt will haPpen .. hahah! hAving my sHower soOn .. bb!

finally! finished with all the math worksheet. start at 9 .. end at 2. arsenal edged out manu 3:1 in yesterdays charity shield match. tuition coming up at three. 39 yrs of independence! proud to be a singaporean. theres only one thing im looking fwd to during the ndp, the jets. saluting the nation in airbourne .. nt to be missed! :)

4 hrs during the day finishing up the math worksheets. two more left though. mum nv cook so skip lunch. arrived tuition late all bcos my sis spent ages in the toilet. then again .. three hrs of math during the afternoon. came back home ard 8 plus. hmph .. mum nv cook dinner so ordered kfc. yea, im waiting for delivery to arrived .. so hungry!! something to look fwd to, charity shield match with arsenal against manu. nt sure who will win.

met my friends and played badminton. help dad changed the rollers for the toilet sliding door. my shoe gt missing. watch i robot with aidAh. showed her some bAts. heh .. all of a sudden im missing red bull. frustrated sey. visitors treat this place like karaoke lounge. watching tv soon. be back tmr.

no lessons today. had fun during the ndp concert. watch aidAh dance .. wah! coming to the end of the concert, 4A and 4E clashed. shiok sey! its been quite a while since we last behaved like tht. after the concert, we proceed to the jumbo sale. was looking for my friends when i stumbled apon aidAh. accompanied her with her friends. june took photo of us. things were going well until i saw iskandar beaten up by rosdiman. went after iskandar just to check whether he was ok. called my friends down to break off the fight. anyway, it was fun with aidAh today. be back later.
urlLink my girl .. cute sey! :P

phywit! since mid yr exam .. tk nah fail my math. did well for recent tests on algebra and mensuration. gt news frm sri saying she will nt turn up for sch tmr. she complained about chest pain so she will be checking at ttsh. done with the poa board game. pretty neat :) todays assembly was ok ok ah. ey, heard ruth and shyam fought in sch yesterday. wasted ah! nv see girl fight before .. comfirm violent one :P from this point .. berjuang all out utk Os. pilot rEyd!! ndp coming up also. fighter planes display .. nt to be missed. someday, hopefully i will be among those pilots flying above the national stadium. a dream too high? i will give my all. btw, gt aidAhs photo (the one on top). cute yar? chuBby!! k ah .. thts about all. be back soOn.
urlLink ndp air show will some wat look like this ya?

regret doing conditioning yesterday night. i slept ard 3am and just woke up. physically tired and have little time to spare. need to get my poa homework and project done with. gt math test tmr also. 5 hrs left. err .. i will make it insyaAllah! :) be back later ..
